title: Fragment Of A Rank Badge, 15th–17th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous wefts (tapestry or k'ossu)
description: Fragment of a rank badgeshowing part of a bird, an auspicious fungus growing from a rock, and a cloud background.

Fragment Of A Rank Badge, 15th–17th century.
15th–17th century. Medium: silk, metallic
